## AbstractPostEffect.needFlip() method

Check if the post effect should be rendered upside down.

**Signature:**

```typescript
needFlip(device: AbstractDevice): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  device | [AbstractDevice](doc/markdown/./device.abstractdevice.md) | The device object |

**Returns:**

boolean

true if the post effect should be rendered upside down
